name: CodePie
description: CodePie is a secure coding platform designed for conducting Coding contests with real-time evaluation and strong anti-cheating measures. Built for academic testing, it supports scheduling, isolated code execution, and large-scale participation for practical exams.
features: Create and schedule secure DSA contests
Real-time student code evaluation using Judge0
Anti-cheating via session monitoring and environment isolation
Scalable backend tested with 160+ concurrent students
Role-based access for faculty and students
